room_title: Escape room "Antidote" by Escapology Wichita in Wichita
review: I went with my wife and a group of friends. We did the easiest room which was the Antidote and it was so much fun! It was challenging but that is what made it so fun! Definitely going back soon!

room_title: Escape room "Antidote" by Escapology Wichita in Wichita
review: Antidote was pretty cool! Had a great time solving the riddles and discovering clues.

room_title: Escape room "Antidote" by Escapology Wichita in Wichita
review: We tried the Antidote Room, which they told us was the easiest, since it was our first time trying anything like this. So I thought it would be easy, but believe me, it's really challenging, especially when your on a time limit. We were amazed at how well thought out this all was! There was actually 3 rooms in ours, to hunt for clues and try to solve finding the antidote. Was really well done, a lot of fun, and now we want to try the other rooms.
